--- DateTime: 2018/4/17 9:28
---
local RoomFrame = {}
local barFrame = nil

function RoomFrame.OnOpenFrame()
    local attachNode = self.frame:GetObject('pnl_bar_frame')
    barFrame = app.FrameManager.OpenFrameLua(app._FrameList.BarFrame,nil,-1,attachNode)
    self.frame:AddChildFrame(barFrame);
    self.frame:GetObject('btn_room_1').onClick:AddListener(RoomFrame.onClickRoom1)
    --[[self.frame:GetObject('btn_room_2').onClick:AddListener(RoomFrame.onClickRoom2)
    self.frame:GetObject('btn_room_3').onClick:AddListener(RoomFrame.onClickRoom3)
    self.frame:GetObject('btn_room_4').onClick:AddListener(RoomFrame.onClickRoom4)]]--
end

RoomFrame.onClickRoom1 = function()
    CS.GameClient.SceneManager.Instance():SwitchScene(1)
end

function RoomFrame.OnCloseFrame()
    barFrame = nil
end

return RoomFrame
